dc_description_s: Mounted cover title. Wood block print, on Japanese paper. Relief shown pictorially. Oriented with north toward the lower left. Includes distance information, names of towns and villages, shrines and towns, rivers and mountains, etc. 1 map: col.; 119 x 208 cm., folded in covers 30 x 22 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
